title: Was Officer Nakia Jones Fired After Posting a Viral Police Brutality Video?
subtitle: Nakia Jones said the Warrensville Heights Police Department fired her after she made a video in July 2016 following the shooting death of Alton Sterling in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Police officer Nakia Jones was fired after expressing her thoughts about police brutality in a viral Facebook live video.
